Michael Ballack Tidak Terkejut Frank Lampard Sukses di Chelsea, Mengapa?
01 Nov 2019, 16:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mantan pemain Chelsea, Michael Ballack mengomentari tren positif yang tengah dijalani Frank Lampard sebagai manajer Chelsea. Ballack menilai bahwa mantan rekan setimnya itu punya segala yang dibutuhkan untuk menjadi pelatih yang sukses.
Pada musim panas kemarin, Lampard resmi kembali ke Chelsea. Ia menjadi juru taktik The Blues yang baru menggantikan Maurizio Sarri yang pindah ke Juventus.
Sempat mengalami awal yang kurang mulus, namun perlahan tapi pasti Chelsea mulai tampil meyakinkan. Mereka bahkan kini berada di peringkat empat klasemen sementara EPL.
Ballack sendiri mengakui bahwa ia sudah menduga mantan rekan setimnya itu bakal sukses besar saat menangani Chelsea. "Saya tidak terlalu terkejut dengan apa yang diraih Frank saat ini," beber Ballack kepada Sky Sports.

Michael Ballack Not Surprised Frank Lampard Succeeds at Chelsea, Why?
Nov 01 2019, 16:20 by Bola.net
Former Chelsea player Michael Ballack commented on the positive trend that Frank Lampard is currently undergoing as Chelsea manager. Ballack believes that his former team-mate has everything he needs to be a successful coach.
Last summer, Lampard officially returned to Chelsea. He became the interpreter of the tactics of the new Blues to replace Maurizio Sarri who moved to Juventus.
Had experienced a less smooth start, but slowly but surely Chelsea began to appear convincing. They are even now ranked fourth in the EPL standings.
Ballack himself admitted that he had expected the former teammate to be a huge success when dealing with Chelsea. "I'm not too surprised by what Frank has achieved at the moment," Ballack told Sky Sports.
